001package edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.dao;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.room.Dao;
005import androidx.room.Delete;
006import androidx.room.Insert;
007import androidx.room.OnConflictStrategy;
008import androidx.room.Query;
009import androidx.room.RewriteQueriesToDropUnusedColumns;
010import androidx.room.Transaction;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.AttendanceAggregate;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.model.entity.Student;
013import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Maybe;
014import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
015import java.time.Instant;
016import java.util.List;
017
018@Dao
019public interface StudentDao {
020
021  @Insert
022  Single<Long> insert(Student student);
023
024  @Delete
025  Single<Integer> delete(Student student);
026
027  @Query("SELECT * FROM student WHERE student_id = :id")
028  LiveData<Student> select(long id);
029
030  @Query("SELECT * FROM student WHERE name = :name")
031  Maybe<Student> selectByName(String name);
032
033  @Query("SELECT * FROM student WHERE name LIKE :pattern ORDER BY name")
034  LiveData<List<Student>> search(String pattern);
035
036  @Query("SELECT * FROM student ORDER BY name")
037  LiveData<List<Student>> get();
038
039  @Transaction
040  @Query("SELECT DISTINCT * FROM student AS s JOIN zoom_meeting AS z ON z.student_id = s.student_id WHERE s.student_id = :studentId AND z.started <= :end AND z.started + z.duration >= :start ORDER BY z.started ASC")
041  LiveData<List<AttendanceAggregate>> getAggregate(long studentId, Instant start, Instant end);
042
043}
